name: Laserpit
description:
April 2023's Greatest Laser Duel Game has arrived.

Take your laser gun and challenge your friend to some fast-paced laser goodness where one wrong move is your opponent's next win!

Enjoy some wall bouncing, chiptunes and get called a total buffoon for failing while at it. You don't want to be called one, do you? Better aim those shots!

Controls:

WASD / Left Joystick - Player 1 Movement

E / Rightmost Button - Player 1 Shoot

Q / Upmost Button - Player 1 Robot Toggle

Arrow Keys / Left Joystick - Player 2 Movement

L / Rightmost Button - Player 2 Shoot

O / Upmost Button - Player 2 Robot Toggle

F11 - Toggle Fullscreen

R - Reload Game (after victory)

Esc - Exit Game
